item.title: Toronto Homeless Shelters [Data Visualization]
item.description: The #TidyTuesday data of the week come from #OpenDataToronto on homeless shelters in Toronto and their occupancy from 2017 - 2019. I took a try at web map with help from #rstats and Leafletjs.
